mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_yx_coupon a where 1=1 and a.`status` ='4'
ORDER BY a.`createdate` DESC

SELECT
CASE t.`coupon_type_id` WHEN 'fullDown' THEN '满减券' WHEN 'cash' THEN '现金券' WHEN 'interest' THEN '增益券' WHEN 'cashBack' THEN '返现券' END AS couponTypeId ,
CONCAT(t.face_value,'元') AS faceValue , CONCAT('有效期',t.effective_days ,'天') AS effectiveDays, CONCAT('出借金额限制',loan_amount_min ,'元') AS loanAmountMin, CONCAT('出借期限限制',t.loan_term_list) AS loanTermList
FROM t_yx_coupon t WHERE 1=1 and t.id IN ( ${ids} )

SELECT CASE t.`coupon_type_id` WHEN 'fullDown' THEN '满减券' WHEN 'cash' THEN '现金券' WHEN 'interest' THEN '增益券' WHEN 'cashBack' THEN '返现券' END AS couponTypeId ,
t.face_value AS faceValue , IFNULL(t.effective_days,'') AS effectiveDays, IFNULL(t.begin_time,'') AS beginTime, IFNULL(t.end_time,'') AS endTime,
t.loan_amount_min AS loanAmountMin, t.loan_term_list AS loanTermList, t.loan_channel_list AS loanChannelList FROM t_yx_coupon t LEFT JOIN t_yx_coupon_relation r ON r.`coupon_id` = t.`id` LEFT JOIN t_yx_activityinfo a ON a.`id` =r.`main_id`
WHERE 1=1 AND r.`main_id` =#{mainId} AND t.status ='4'

SELECT t.id as couponId FROM t_yx_coupon t LEFT JOIN t_yx_coupon_relation r ON r.`coupon_id` = t.`id` LEFT JOIN t_yx_activityinfo a ON a.`id` =r.`main_id`
WHERE r.`main_id` =#{mainId}

SELECT
FROM t_yx_coupon a WHERE a.delflag = '0' AND a.status = '4' AND DATE_ADD(a.end_time,INTERVAL a.effective_days DAY)>NOW()

mapper.update:
UPDATE t_yx_coupon SET
name = #{name},
coupon_type_id = #{couponTypeId},
face_value = #{faceValue},
effective_days = #{effectiveDays},
begin_time = #{beginTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, loan_amount_min = #{loanAmountMin},
loan_amount_sum = #{loanAmountSum},
loan_term_list = #{loanTermList},
loan_channel_list = #{loanChannelList},
coupon_count = #{couponCount},
is_send = #{isSend},
createdate = #{createdate},
createby = #{createby},
updatedate = #{updatedate},
updateby = #{updateby},
remarks = #{remarks},
delflag = #{delflag},
status = #{status}
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_yx_coupon SET updateby = #{updateby},delflag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_yx_coupon SET updateby = #{updateby},status = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.effective_days AS "effectiveDays", a.begin_time AS "beginTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.status AS "status" FROM t_yx_coupon a WHERE a.`status`!='5' AND a.end_time < NOW()
SELECT COUNT(1) AS 'total' FROM t_yx_coupon_log WHERE end_time < #{nowTime} AND status = '0' ;
SELECT id,status,end_time AS 'endTime' FROM t_yx_coupon_log WHERE end_time < #{nowTime} AND status = '0' LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
SELECT mobile FROM t_yx_coupon_log WHERE status='0' AND DATE(end_time)=DATE_ADD(#{nowTime},INTERVAL 2 DAY) GROUP BY mobile
